title: D501 4G DashCam
metaDesc: Compact D501 4G Dashcam offering dual-lens recording (road + cabin) and cloud connectivity.
fullDescription: Compact cigarette lighter 4G dashcam offering dual-channel recording (1080P front + 720P inside). Features plug-and-play installation, remote live monitoring, WiFi hotspot, and intelligent driving behavior analysis.
features: Dual Recording: 1080P (120° front) + 720P (90° inside) simultaneous recording
Instant Install: Cigarette lighter plug-and-play design
Remote Monitoring: 4G/WiFi connectivity for live video, GPS tracking, and intercom
Intelligent Alerts: SOS, collision, geofence, and overspeed alarms
packaging: 1x D501 Dashcam, 1x Power Cable, 1x 3M Mount, 1x SOS Button
